DESCRIPTION: Manage role rewards for your servers leveling system.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}levelrole create [#] [role]** ~ Gives a role when the user achieves this level.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}levelrole add [#] [role]** ~ Add another role to give when the user reaches this level. You must have created a levelrole already.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}levelrole remove [#] [role] [role2]** ~ Remove a role to give when the user reaches this level. You must have created a levelrole already.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: â€¢ Advanced: You can use the unique rolesets to make sure that a user only has 1 level role at any time.
ALIASES: Levelrole does not have any aliases.
CREATED: The role rewards for level #{{level}} have been created.
ROLES_ADDED: The role has been added to the role rewards for this level.
ROLES_REMOVED: The role has been removed from the role rewards for this level.
EXISTS: There is already a levelrole setup for this server.
